p: All the EOs tested in this study had been previously assayed against an Escherichia coli strain: C. zeylanicum had an MIC value of 2.52 mg/mL, S. aromaticum of 1.318 mg/mL and their blend of 2.578 mg/mL [ 8]. The activity against the different Salmonella isolates resulted as being much higher, in fact MIC values decreased to 0.63 mg/mL, 0.164 mg/mL and 0.322 mg/mL, respectively.
